content: Hamirpur District treasury spent ₹ 38 lakhs in Beti Hai Anmol scheme, while the neighbouring district of Bilaspur spent as much as ₹ 68 lakhs'.
This scheme is for girls of BPL families up to two girl children. After their birth, the department deposits rupees 10,000 per girl child in the post office/ Bank account.

content: In March 2019 the district of Mandi spent ₹ 22,88,63,222 (₹ 22 Crores) on public primary schools and ₹ 11,56,381 (₹ 1 crore) on Jails.
In March 2019, the district of Sirmaur spent ₹ 13,04,64,511 (₹ 13 Crores) on public primary schools in the district while it spent ₹ 36,79,103 (₹ 3.7 crores) on jails.
In march 2019, the Shimla Capital treasury spent ₹ 97.90 Crores on the maintenance of the Ayurveda department building.
For the month of mar 2019, the amount that was allocated for the rural health services in Dharamshala was ₹ 756.72 Crores and the amount that was actually spent was ₹ 533.88 Crores
In Feb 2019, the government of himachal pradesh was sanctioned to spend ₹ 77 thousand on prevention and control of diseases while it ended up spending ₹ 45,365.
